## PWM0Gpio type

PWM0, which can be set to use GPIOs 12, 18, 40, and 52. Only 12 (pin 32) and 18 (pin 12) are available on the B+/2B/3B See [https://github.com/jgarff/rpi\_ws281x?tab=readme-ov-file\#pwm](https://github.com/jgarff/rpi_ws281x?tab=readme-ov-file#pwm)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PWM0Gpio = 12 | 18 | 40 | 52;
```
